code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';var initialState={todos:[]};export var Slice=createSlice({name:'todo',initialState:initialState,reducers:{getAllTodos:function getAllTodos(state,action){state.todos=action.payload;}}});export var store=configureStore({reducer:{todos:Slice.reducer},middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware({serializableCheck:false});}});var getAllTodos=Slice.actions.getAllTodos;export{getAllTodos};export default Slice.reducer;export var useAppDispatch=useDispatch;export var useAppSelector=useSelector;
